name: Brick Maze
description:
Simple brick breaker style game. You can swipe left and right to move the ball. To start the ball moving swipe up. 

Types of Bricks

  •  Grey brick will  act like wall.
  • Black Bricks will KILL YOU
  • Green Brick break on one hit
  • Purple Brick Break on 2 hits.

This is an early prototype There is only one level so far. 

Pause Button will let you reset if there is an error or resume. 

I hope you Enjoy it

and let know if you have any recommendations
